snippet.title: Project M 3.6 Trailer
snippet.description:
The Official Trailer of Project M 3.6

What is Project M? Project M is the premier Brawl modification inspired by Super Smash Bros. Melee's gameplay designed to add rich, technical gameplay to a balanced cast of characters while additionally enhancing the speed of play. Project M employs new codes which seamlessly add in new, universal features to the entire cast to add technical variety to all characters.

Clips recorded by SOJ
Video edited by Warchamp7

Song: Garrett Williamson - Super Mario World Castle Theme Remix
Download: https://soundcloud.com/gwilliamson/project-m-super-mario-world-castle-theme

Follow Us: https://www.twitter.com/ProjectMGame
Like Us: http://www.facebook.com/ProjectMGame
For more details visit: http://projectmgame.com
